attributes.action: Knight Gareth Southgate for bringing football home
attributes.background: Gareth Southgate has brought football home, metaphorically and potentially physically - give him a knighthood for making us believe again

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
